mapper.update: update activestep set userId = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sumStep = #{sumstep,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, endTime = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, userId, sumStep, status, createTime, endTime from activestep
select id, userId, sumStep, status, createTime, endTime from activestep order by sumStep desc limit 100
